path: PDF Library/30 Rock Studio Maintenance - 30 Rock Global Infrastructure/30 Rock Router Cheat Sheet.xlsx
text: Sheet1 								 30 Rock Routing Cheat Sheet								 								 > = Route Path								 xx = Indicates a variable that can vary based on needs								 30 Rock to Cloud 								 In 30 Rock					In the Cloud			 EXE Source Going to Cloud Control	>	EXE Subscription	>	EXE Physical Dest	>	Sienna Src	>	Sienna Dest This varies based on application(BSP, MW, etc.)	>	CLOUD IN 14 Through 37	>	CLOUD TX 49 Through 76	>	30R 14 Through 37	>	This varies based on application(BSP, MW, etc. ) Cloud to 30 Rock								 In the Cloud				In 30 Rock				 Sienna Src	>	Sienna Dest	>	EXE Physical Src	>	EXE Subscription 	>	EXE CR Src This varies based on application(BSP, MW, etc.)	>	30R SEND 13 Through 24	>	REMOTE NDI 25 Through 42	>	CLOUD OUT 10 Through 24	>	This varies based on application(BSP, MW, etc. ) 								 EXE to Master Grid								 EXE SRC Going to MG	>	EXE Dest	>			MG Src	>	Destination on MG This varies based on application(BSP, MW, etc.)	>	RTR MG CR E701 Through 747	>			CR-E701 Through 747	>	This varies based on application(CR, MW, etc. ) Master Grid to EXE								 MG SRC Going to EXE	>	MG Dest	>			EXE Subscription	>	Destination on EXE This varies based on application(CR, MW, etc. )	>	CR-3101 Through 3116	>			RTR MG SRC 001 Through 016	>	This varies based on application(BSP, MW, etc. ) 								 EXE to Prometheus								 EXE Source going to Prometheus Closet	>	EXE Dest Subscription	>	EXE Physical Dest	>	3N Patch Panel (physical Patch needed to be made to Telecast)	>	Fiber Transmit This varies based on application(BSP, MW, etc. )	>	SDO PROM MON 01 Through 16	>	PROM MON 01 PHY Through 16	>	3N-34 TD-Patch Panel xx	>	Telecast DST xx (located in 3N-RK34) Prometheus to EXE								 Fiber Transmit	>	3N Patch Panel (physical Patch needed to be made from Telecast)	>	EXE Physical Source	>	EXE Destination 		 Telecast SRC xx (located in 3N-RK34)	>	IPRD-xx allocated in RK12 Patch M,R,P 	>	RTR 3N xxx	>	This varies based on application(CR, MW, etc. )
